dialogue.text: The question no longer belongs to me. It belongs to all of us, spreading like seeds on wind.
Question curriculum reduced anxiety in my students.
We need spaces that honor not-knowing. Not everyone has philosophical families.
My grandson wants to study 'uncertainty design' in college. Because of what you started.
Because of what started in all of us.

psychological_notes: Depicts complete transformation from personal crisis to cultural resource. The question has evolved from Evan's private struggle to public good. Shows how individual healing can catalyze systemic change. Multiple generations now involved in normalizing uncertainty.
philosophical_underpinning: Personal transformation as seed for cultural evolution
therapeutic_direction: Collective healing through shared uncertainty spaces
